name: api_buy_license_prepay
description:
Purchase a License and optionally uses PrePay.  Will return an error if
* use_prepay is true not enough PrePay funds are available.

function.name: api_buy_license_prepay
function.desc: Purchase a License and optionally uses PrePay.  Will return an error if use_prepay is true not enough PrePay funds are available.

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

ip.name: ip
ip.description: ip address you wish to license some software on

use_prepay.name: use_prepay
use_prepay.description: optional, whether or not to use a prepay, if specified as true will return an error if not enough prepay

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param ip string ip address you wish to license some software on
* @param type int 
* @param coupon string an optional coupon
* @param use_prepay bool optional, whether or not to use a prepay, if specified as true will return an error if not enough prepay
